name: Race Track Day
description:
Drive The Best Supercars In Track Racing Competitions.

The Game Features:

High Detailed 10 Racing Supercars with 10 Different Custom Colors.
Realistic Physics with Turbo and Nitro, also Great Opponent's Artificial Intelligence.
Includes 4 views: External, Back, Driver's and Hood View.

4 Race Tracks in Different Environments with Random Weather Conditions:
Long and Short Race Tracks.
Mountain and Desert Race Tracks.
City Track.

Two Modes of Game Play:
1. Circuit Racing with up 5 Opponents and up 5 Laps.
2. Knockout Racing Lap.
